resources.string: Chaotic Draw: A Draw in Chaotic Mode.
Deja Vu: Same Game state three moves in a game.
The Long Haul: Play a Chaotic game with 20 moves.
With a Little Help From Your Friends: Win in 3 moves.
Clean Slate: Return to initial state after 5 moves.
Reversi: Win a Reverse style game.
The Good Samaritan: Help your opponent win in 3 moves.
Two Birds with One Stone: Win a game in two directions at once.
The Good Sport: Place forced winning move for your opponent.
Fork in the Road: Win a game in one of multiple ways.
Oops: Play an unforced winning move for your opponent.
Friendly Fire: Needlessly bomb one of your own markers.
Missed Opportunites: Miss playing a winning move.
The Forced Hand: Play one of multiple forced winning moves for your opponent.
